root: ^What a success! This mission couldn't have gone any better.
^Maybe those suckers at Conch Labs will give me a promotion...
^When they hear one of their scientists managed to retrieve THE Panacea, they're bound to give me a raise at least.
^I mean, its THE ultimate cure-all for all human diseases!
^Not bad, if I do say so myself.
^Well, I should probably activate the automated return sequence and get out of here.
^I should move over to the computer using the WASD buttons, and look at the button using the MOUSE.
^Jeez, I must have been down here too long. Well anyways...
